price: 52. They are those whom Allâh has cursed, and he whom Allâh curses, you will not find for him (any) helper,
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُۖ وَمَن يَلۡعَنِ ٱللَّهُ فَلَن تَجِدَ لَهُۥ نَصِيرًا

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: ulāika alladhīna laʿanahumu al-lahu waman yalʿani al-lahu falan tajida lahu naṣīran
